member.name: T:Verbex.BasicLemmatizer
member.summary: Basic lemmatizer implementation using simple suffix rules for common English word forms. This is a simplified lemmatizer suitable for basic text processing needs. Thread-safe for concurrent access.

member.name: M:Verbex.BasicLemmatizer.Lemmatize(System.String)
member.summary: Reduces a word to its base form using simple suffix rules and irregular word mappings.
member.param: The word to lemmatize. Cannot be null or empty.
member.returns: The lemmatized form of the word.
member.exception: Thrown when word is empty or whitespace.

member.name: T:Verbex.BasicStopWordRemover
member.summary: Basic stop word remover implementation using a predefined list of common English stop words. This implementation focuses on the most frequently used stop words that typically don't contribute meaningful content to search operations. Thread-safe for concurrent access.

member.name: M:Verbex.BasicStopWordRemover.IsStopWord(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a word should be removed as a stop word.
member.param: The word to evaluate. Cannot be null or empty.
member.returns: True if the word is a stop word and should be removed; otherwise false.
member.exception: Thrown when word is empty or whitespace.

member.summary: Defines the storage mode for the inverted index.

member.name: F:Verbex.StorageMode.InMemory
member.summary: Index is stored in an in-memory SQLite database. Fast performance but data is lost when application terminates unless explicitly flushed.

member.name: F:Verbex.StorageMode.OnDisk
member.summary: Index is stored in a file-based SQLite database. Data is persisted immediately to disk for maximum durability.

member.name: T:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator
member.summary: Provides centralized generation of k-sortable unique identifiers for all database entities. Uses PrettyId library to generate IDs that are both unique and chronologically sortable.
member.remarks: All generated IDs are exactly 32 characters in length including their entity-specific prefix. IDs include a timestamp component ensuring chronological sorting when queried.

member.name: F:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.TotalIdLength
member.summary: Total length for all generated IDs including prefix.

member.name: F:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.DocumentPrefix
member.summary: Prefix for document IDs.

member.name: F:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.TermPrefix
member.summary: Prefix for term IDs.

member.name: F:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.DocumentTermPrefix
member.summary: Prefix for document-term mapping IDs.

member.name: F:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.LabelPrefix
member.summary: Prefix for label IDs.

member.name: F:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.TagPrefix
member.summary: Prefix for tag IDs.

member.name: F:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.IndexMetadataPrefix
member.summary: Prefix for index metadata IDs.

member.name: F:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.Generator
member.summary: The PrettyId generator instance used for all ID generation.

member.name: M:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.GenerateDocumentId
member.summary: Generates a new k-sortable unique identifier for a document.
member.returns: A 32-character k-sortable unique identifier with "doc_" prefix.

member.name: M:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.GenerateTermId
member.summary: Generates a new k-sortable unique identifier for a term.
member.returns: A 32-character k-sortable unique identifier with "term_" prefix.

member.name: M:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.GenerateDocumentTermId
member.summary: Generates a new k-sortable unique identifier for a document-term mapping.
member.returns: A 32-character k-sortable unique identifier with "docterm_" prefix.

member.name: M:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.GenerateLabelId
member.summary: Generates a new k-sortable unique identifier for a label.
member.returns: A 32-character k-sortable unique identifier with "label_" prefix.

member.name: M:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.GenerateTagId
member.summary: Generates a new k-sortable unique identifier for a tag.
member.returns: A 32-character k-sortable unique identifier with "tag_" prefix.

member.name: M:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.GenerateIndexMetadataId
member.summary: Generates a new k-sortable unique identifier for index metadata.
member.returns: A 32-character k-sortable unique identifier with "idx_" prefix.

member.name: M:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.Generate
member.summary: Generates a new k-sortable unique identifier without a prefix.
member.remarks: Prefer using the entity-specific methods (GenerateDocumentId, GenerateTermId, etc.) for better traceability. This method is provided for backward compatibility.

member.name: M:Verbex.Utilities.IdGenerator.Generate(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a new k-sortable unique identifier with a custom prefix.
member.param: The prefix to prepend to the generated ID.
member.returns: A 32-character k-sortable unique identifier string with the specified prefix.
member.exception: Thrown when prefix is 24 characters or longer.
member.remarks: Prefer using the entity-specific methods (GenerateDocumentId, GenerateTermId, etc.) for standard entity types. This method is provided for custom entity types.

member.name: T:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration settings for the Verbex inverted index.

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.StorageMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the storage mode for the index. Default: InMemory

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.StorageDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the storage directory for disk-based storage mode. Only used when StorageMode is OnDisk. If null, the database will be created in the default location.

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.DatabaseFilename
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQLite database filename. Default: "index.db"

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.MinTokenLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum token length. Tokens shorter than this will be excluded. Valid range: 0 to Int32.MaxValue. Set to 0 to disable minimum length filtering. Default: 0 (disabled)

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.MaxTokenLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum token length. Tokens longer than this will be excluded. Valid range: 0 to Int32.MaxValue. Set to 0 to disable maximum length filtering. Default: 0 (disabled)

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.Lemmatizer
member.summary: Gets or sets the lemmatizer instance for reducing words to their base forms. If null, no lemmatization will be performed.

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.StopWordRemover
member.summary: Gets or sets the stop word remover instance for filtering common words. If null, no stop word filtering will be performed.

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.Tokenizer
member.summary: Gets or sets the tokenizer instance for splitting text into tokens. If null, the default tokenizer will be used.

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.DefaultMaxSearchResults
member.summary: Gets or sets the default maximum search results. Default: 100

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.PhraseSearchBonus
member.summary: Gets or sets the phrase search scoring bonus multiplier. Default: 2.0

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.SigmoidNormalizationDivisor
member.summary: Gets or sets the sigmoid normalization divisor for score calculation. Default: 10.0

member.name: P:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.TokenizationDelimiters
member.summary: Gets or sets the tokenization delimiters. Default: space, tab, newline, carriage return, period, comma, semicolon, colon, exclamation, question mark.

member.name: M:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.GetDatabasePath
member.summary: Gets the full database path for disk-based storage.
member.returns: Full path to the database file.

member.name: M:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.GetDefaultStorageDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the default storage directory for the Verbex index. Returns the path to .vbx/indices/{indexName}/ in the user's profile directory.
member.returns: Full path to the default storage directory.
member.exception: Thrown when indexName is empty or whitespace.

member.name: M:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.CreateInMemory
member.summary: Creates a configuration with default settings for in-memory storage.

member.name: M:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.CreateOnDisk(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a configuration with default settings for disk-based storage.
member.param: Name of the index (used to create storage directory).
member.exception: Thrown when indexName is empty or whitespace.

member.name: M:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.CreateOnDisk(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a configuration with default settings for disk-based storage at a custom path.
member.exception: Thrown when storageDirectory is empty or whitespace.

member.name: M:Verbex.VerbexConfiguration.Validate
member.summary: Validates the configuration settings.
member.exception: Thrown when configuration values are invalid.

member.summary: Creates a copy of this configuration.
